import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Carinfo} from "../../carinfo"; import { Input} from "@angular/core"; import { CarsComponent} from "../cars/cars.component"; @Component({ selector: 'app-catalog', template: `
`, styleUrls: ['./catalog.component.css'] }) export class CatalogComponent { readonly baseUrl = 'https://angular.io/assets/images/tutorials/faa'; carinfoList: Carinfo [] = [ { id: 0, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsOne', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 1, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsTwo', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 2, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsThree', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 3, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsFour', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 4, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsFive', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 5, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsSix', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 6, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsSeven', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 7, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsEight', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' }, { id: 8, name: 'Aston Martin', model: 'Vanquish', address: '/detailsNine', photo: ``, hp: 565, speed: 275, volume: 'V12 6.0' } ]; }
